name: The Crew (itch)
description:
What could be sweeter than going on an adventure with friends?

The Crew is a very short interactive sci-fi horror story.

This game is all about the story. There are no difficult puzzles, but four (slightly) different endings. If you still get stuck, write me and I will fix it (or help you).

Age recommendation

Possibly PG-13. This game is meant to be scary and gross.  If you don't feel like being creeped or grossed out, don't play it. And especially don't complain that it wasn't scary enough! Other than that, there's no swearing, no nudity, drinking or drugging.
